document.full_text: the boston bruins clawed their way back into the nhl first-round playoff series against montreal with a 4-2 road win over the canadiens monday.
document.title: chara return boosts bruins to win over habs
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins clawed their way back into the nhl first-round playoff series against montreal with a 4-2 road win over the canadiens monday.
